item.title: How to make npc's hit more! (474)
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

Hey guys, i really need help with this, lately no one has responded to any of my posts, i posted a post about adding nex a minute ago, havent got a post in 30 minutes anyways. i need to know how to make npc’s hit more,This is what my chaos ele code in npchandler.java looks like:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200)
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x326; // drags: chaos ele
// emote ( YESSS )

And this is the second one:

case 3200:
int r2 = Misc.random(1);
if (r2 == 0) {
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
npcs[i].gfx100(550);
npcs[i].projectileId = 551;
npcs[i].endGfx = 552;

Theres many more rthat just say case 3200
But i wanna know how or what to put to make him hit higher, if you can help me please do
Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npc's hit more! (474)
